biotools.summary: sparrpowR is a flexible R package to estimate statistical power to identify spatial clustering of two groups and its application. The sparrpowR package is a suite of R functions to calculate the statistical power to detect clusters using the kernel-based spatial relative risk function that is estimated using the sparr package.
